entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
